footer.mission: nudger.fr is an open approach to assess the environmental impact of consumer goods and partially offset the impact of your online purchases.

hero.title: Transparent product data for responsible commerce
hero.subtitle: Download GTIN and ISBN datasets maintained by Nudger to build your own analyses, services and research.

primaryCta.label: Explore the datasets
primaryCta.ariaLabel: Scroll to the open data datasets section

totalProducts.label: Products covered
totalProducts.description: Unique products referenced across all exports.

totalSize.label: Combined size
totalSize.description: Total compressed footprint of weekly exports.

datasets.title: Two complementary datasets
datasets.subtitle: Pick the export that matches your project. Both are updated weekly and delivered under the Open Database Licence.

gtin.title: GTIN catalogue
gtin.description: All products indexed in Nudger with brand, model, price range and category insights.

features.coverage: Includes EAN13, UPC and GS1 country metadata
features.uses: Ideal for price comparison, assortment analysis and category monitoring

cta.label: View GTIN dataset
cta.ariaLabel: Open the GTIN open data page

isbn.title: ISBN library
isbn.description: Dedicated export for books with pricing, availability and classification information.

features.catalogue: Includes publisher, format and Decitre classifications
features.research: Great for catalogue enrichment, research and cultural analytics

cta.label: View ISBN dataset
cta.ariaLabel: Open the ISBN open data page

fast.title: Fast mirror (data.gouv.fr)
fast.description: Download via the official open data portal hosted by the French government.

cta.label: Download from data.gouv.fr
cta.ariaLabel: Open the dataset on data.gouv.fr in a new tab

direct.title: Direct download from Nudger
direct.description: Retrieve the ZIP file directly from Nudger's infrastructure.

cta.label: Download from nudger.fr
cta.ariaLabel: Start the direct download from Nudger

download.title: Download options
download.subtitle: Choose the mirror that matches your bandwidth and automation needs.

fast.highlight: Curated for broad retail and circular economy use cases

format.title: File format
format.description: Data is delivered as a compressed CSV archive ready for ingestion.

gtin.columnsTitle: Columns included in the GTIN dataset
gtin.columnsSubtitle: Each row represents a product identifier enriched with metadata gathered by Nudger.

brand.label: brand
brand.description: Brand declared or inferred for the product.

model.label: model
model.description: Manufacturer model or SKU reference when available.

last_updated.label: last_updated
last_updated.description: Epoch timestamp (ms) of the latest update for this product.

gs1_country.label: gs1_country
gs1_country.description: Country code derived from the GS1 prefix.

gtinType.label: gtinType
gtinType.description: Type of barcode detected (EAN13, UPC, etc.).

offers_count.label: offers_count
offers_count.description: Number of commercial offers tracked for the product.

min_price.label: min_price
min_price.description: Lowest observed price across all offers.

min_price_compensation.label: min_price_compensation
min_price_compensation.description: Carbon contribution associated with the lowest price.

currency.label: currency
currency.description: Currency code of the lowest price.

url.label: url
url.description: Product page URL when public offers are available.

download.title: Download options
download.subtitle: Pick the mirror that suits your workflow and traffic needs.

fast.highlight: Mirror maintained for open culture and library reuse

format.title: File format
format.description: Data is delivered as a compressed CSV archive ready for ingestion.

isbn.columnsTitle: Columns included in the ISBN dataset
isbn.columnsSubtitle: Each row corresponds to a book identified by its ISBN.

title.label: title
title.description: Book title as provided by sources.

last_updated.label: last_updated
last_updated.description: Epoch timestamp (ms) of the last update.

offers_count.label: offers_count
offers_count.description: Number of commercial offers tracked for the book.

min_price_compensation.label: min_price_compensation
min_price_compensation.description: Carbon contribution associated with the lowest price.

currency.label: currency
currency.description: Currency code of the lowest price.

url.label: url
url.description: Product page URL when offers are available.

souscategorie.label: souscategorie
souscategorie.description: Primary subcategory assigned to the book.

souscategorie2.label: souscategorie2
souscategorie2.description: Secondary subcategory assigned to the book.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Key concepts about the ISBN export.

seo.title: Contact Nudger
seo.description: Get in touch with the Nudger collective for partnerships, product questions or impact insights.
seo.imageAlt: Nudger logomark used for the contact page preview

hero.title: We would love to hear from you
hero.subtitle: Partnerships, product questions or impact insights? Our team is ready.
hero.description: Tell us more about your project, your organisation or the way you use Nudger so we can connect you with the right people.

highlights.commitment: Replies within two working days for most requests.
highlights.expertise: Product, data and impact experts dedicated to responsible commerce.
highlights.impact: Every message helps us build a fairer, more sustainable marketplace.

channels.title: How we can help
channels.subtitle: Pick the topic that suits you best—every request reaches the same caring team.

support.label: Product & user support
support.description: Questions about the comparator or trouble signing in? We will guide you step by step.

partnerships.label: Partnerships & ecosystem
partnerships.description: Looking to collaborate, integrate Nudger data or co-create initiatives? Let's explore it together.

trust.label: Press & civic impact
trust.description: Media, institutions or researchers can reach us for interviews, testimonies and key figures.

details.title: Different ways to collaborate
details.subtitle: Our collective unites citizens, entrepreneurs and institutions around responsible consumption.

support.title: Need help with the platform?
support.description: Describe your question in the form and share as much context as possible so we can provide an actionable answer.
support.ctaAria: Scroll to the contact form to write to the Nudger team

partnerships.title: Co-create impactful projects
partnerships.description: From retailers to NGOs and local authorities, we build bridges to accelerate ecological transition.

community.title: Join the conversation
community.description: Follow our updates, product releases and community calls on LinkedIn.
community.ctaAria: Open Nudger's LinkedIn page in a new tab

form.title: Tell us more about you
form.subtitle: Fill in the information below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

feedback.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent. We will contact you shortly.
feedback.genericError: We were unable to send your message. Please try again or contact us later.
feedback.missingSiteKey: Captcha is not configured yet. Please try again later.

name.length: Your name must contain at least 2 characters.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.

message.length: Your message must be at least 10 characters long.

errors.captchaFailed: Captcha verification failed. Please refresh and try again.
errors.missingCaptcha: Please complete the captcha before sending.

form.privacy: We only use your contact details to answer your request and never share them with third parties.

hero.title: Shape Nudger with your ideas
hero.subtitle: Report bugs, suggest features and vote on the improvements you need next.
hero.description: Your feedback steers our roadmap. Discover what others requested, upvote the most useful ideas and submit your own improvements.

primaryCta.label: Browse the feedback board
primaryCta.ariaLabel: Scroll to the Nudger feedback board

secondaryCta.label: Open GitHub issues
secondaryCta.ariaLabel: Open Nudger's GitHub issues in a new tab

stats.title: A living roadmap
stats.description: Help us focus on improvements that matter most.

items.iterations: Weekly iterations on the most upvoted ideas.
items.votes: Three votes per person to highlight key needs.
items.transparency: Public updates for every discussion and decision.

tabs.title: Help us prioritise the roadmap
tabs.description: Pick a category to explore ongoing discussions, vote for the topics that resonate with you, or open a new one.

idea.label: Ideas
idea.description: Suggest enhancements that would make Nudger more helpful for you or your organisation. We review every idea weekly.

bug.label: Bugs
bug.description: Describe any malfunction or inaccurate behaviour you spotted. Precise reports help us fix issues faster.

empty.idea: No ideas yet. Be the first to share yours!
empty.bug: No bugs reported here right now. Thanks for keeping an eye out.

issues.loadError: We couldn't load the feedback board. Please try again.

voting.noVotes: You have no votes left right now.
voting.limitReached: You reached your voting limit for now.

idea.title: Imagine the next improvement
idea.subtitle: Explain how Nudger could better help you or your organisation.
idea.intro: Explain the context of your idea, why it matters and how it would improve Nudger for everyone.
idea.titlePlaceholder: e.g. Compare the carbon footprint of fridges
idea.messagePlaceholder: Describe your idea, the context and the impact you expect.

bug.title: Tell us what went wrong
bug.subtitle: The more details you share, the faster we can investigate and fix it.
bug.intro: Share the steps to reproduce the bug, what you expected and what actually happened so we can investigate quickly.
bug.titlePlaceholder: e.g. Error 500 on the product page
bug.messagePlaceholder: List the steps to reproduce, what you expected and what happened.

feedback.success: Thank you! Your contribution has been recorded and will appear on the board soon.
feedback.missingSiteKey: Captcha is not configured yet. Feedback submissions are temporarily disabled.

errors.missingCaptcha: Please complete the captcha before sending your feedback.

title.length: The title must contain at least 4 characters.

message.length: The message must contain at least 20 characters.

form.privacy: Feedback is public—please avoid sharing personal or sensitive data.

common.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
